ValidationRule.description: Quote Line Items Cannot be Updated if Quote is not in Draft or Procure Service Status and Cost/Price Can only be Updated if Status is in Draft or Procure Service or Cost Configured
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.FirstName <> 'Acorn', $User.FirstName <> 'Integration', (AND(NOT(ISNEW()), IF(ISCHANGED(SBQQ__UnitCost__c), NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c, 'DRAFT'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c, 'Product Configured'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c, 'Cost Configured'))),NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c, 'DRAFT'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c, 'Product Configured')))))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote Line Item Can Only Be Updated for Quote's Status is in Draft/Procure Service. Cost/Price Can only Be Updated, If Quote Status is in Draft/Procure Service/Configure Price
